snippet: A TV ad released Tuesday by the Obama campaign intensified its argument that Mitt Romney's companies at Bain Capital sent jobs to low-wage countries, despite criticism of previous ads by fact-checking groups.
abstract: A TV ad released Tuesday by the Obama campaign intensified its argument that Mitt Romney's companies at Bain Capital sent jobs to low-wage countries, despite criticism of previous ads by fact-checking groups.

headline.main: New Obama Ad Renews Outsourcing Attack
headline.print_headline: The Ad Campaign: New Attack Over Outsourcing
